ISSUE.TITLE: Bug: "is blank" filter not yielding any results on LinkToAnotherRecord column
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: ### Please confirm if bug report does NOT exists already ? - [X] I confirm there is no existing issue for this ### Steps to reproduce ? After upgrading from 0.104.3-pr-5046-20230206-1740 to 0.105.3: - create a table with a column that links to one or more other records - create some rows that do link to one or more records and some that do not link to any other records - create a filter on that column with "is blank" - result: 0 records returned ### Desired Behavior return only the record with empty cells in the LinkToAnotherRecord column ### Project Details Node: **v16.19.1** Arch: **x64** Platform: **linux** Docker: **true** RootDB: **pg** PackageVersion: **0.105.3** ### Attachments _No response_
